long_description: Show off your resourcefulness and rig up a designer outdoor living room using the Ticla Refugio Tarp Shelter along with whatever trees, rocks, and vehicles are available to you. Refugio creates a perfect extension for any Ticla tent, or makes a great shelter for the beach, picnics and other outdoor events. Distinctive design incorporates 2 triangular tarps that work in tandem to create multiple configurations. Strong and smooth shock-corded aluminum pole withstands the elements. Durable coated polyester material shields rain and sun. The Ticla Refugio Tarp Shelter comes with one pole, six stakes, guylines and stuff sack.
short_description: Show off your resourcefulness and rig up a designer outdoor living room using the Ticla Refugio Tarp Shelter along with whatever trees, rocks, and vehicles are available to you.
